pages.title: Gears, Coins, Dusts, etc.
pages.text: Thermal adds multiple forms of metals and gems which are used in various recipes. Most basic are the metal nuggets, which work identically to vanilla iron and gold nuggets.

Dusts can come from crafting ingots with $(l:thermal:equipment/charges/earth_charge)earth charges$(/l) and can be used in recipes (typically alloys) or smelted (metal dusts only). Gears can be crafted using an iron nugget surrounded by 4 ingots/gems of a particular material.

Dusts typically come from the $(l:thermal:technology/machines/pulverizer)pulverizer$(/l) and can be used in recipes (typically alloys) or smelted (metal dusts only). Plates and coins are made exclusively in the $(l:thermal:technology/machines/press)multiservo press$(/l) and are used in various recipes. Gears can be crafted using an iron nugget surrounded by 4 ingots/gems of a particular material. Metal gears can also be created in the press for 4 ingots.
